IN RE: Appeal of the DOWNINGTOWN AREA SCHOOL DISTRICT from the Decision of the Chester County Board of Assessment Appeals for Property Owned by Marchwood Associates Located at 128 Surrey Way, Uwchlan Township, Chester County, Pennsylvania Tax Parcel No.: 33-05-00043.0300 Petition of: Marchwood Associates In re: Appeal of the Downingtown Area School District from the Decision of the Chester County Board of Assessment Appeals for Property Owned by Marchwood Associates Located at 128 Surrey Way, Uwchlan Township, Chester County, Pennsylvania Tax Parcel No.: 33-05-0043.0300 Petition of: Marchwood Associates No. 666 MAL 2017
No. 667 MAL 2017 Supreme Court of Pennsylvania. February 6, 2018

ORDER

PER CURIAM .

AND NOW, this 6th day of February, 2018, the Petition for Allowance of Appeal is DENIED.
